title: Bloomberg Markets: E-Commerce Stokes FedEx Growth
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: E-Commerce Stokes FedEx Growth
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Lee Klaskow Senior Transportation and Logistics Analyst Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing FedEx Corp. poised to reap the benefits of online-shopping growth, forecasting full-year profit in line with analysts’ expectations.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
